name: Destronaughts 3310
description: arrow keys to move and space to shoot. I was pretty bumbed that I missed out on the nokia 3310 jam so I decided to make my own game with the restrictions of the nokia 3310 so I remade my first game, given the time limit and restrictions of the nokia 3310 I could not get that close to the expirience of destronaughts and I only had 1 day to work on it.
